ActOrder in Council P.C. 2008-793 of April 25, 2008
PrecisAppointment of CLAUDETTE DUMONT-SMITH of Gatineau, Quebec, as Commissioner of the Indian Residential Schools Truth and Reconciliation Commission, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective June 1, 2008.
